What is Control4?

Control4 is the premier smart home operating system that brings all your connected devices into a unified, intuitive platform. Think of it as your home's digital butler—one that never sleeps, never forgets, and always makes life easier.

Unified Control

Control lighting, climate, audio, video, security, door locks, and water detection systems from a single interface.

Intelligent Automation

Create custom scenes like "Morning Routine," "Movie Mode," or "Vacation Away" that activate with a single button press.

Seamless Integration

Works with voice assistants (Alexa, Google), doorbells, streaming devices, and over 13,500 third-party products.

Future-Proof Technology

Regular software updates and expandable architecture ensure your system grows with advancing technology.

Control4 Ecosystem

Control4 Controller

Lighting

Dimmers, switches, keypads

Climate

Thermostats, HVAC control

Entertainment

TVs, speakers, streaming

Security

Cameras, locks, sensors

Installation Options for Every Home

Whether you're building new or upgrading an existing home, we have Control4 solutions that fit your needs and budget.

New Construction

Built for Performance

Hardwired Excellence

Control4 can be hardwired during construction for lightning-fast performance and flawless reliability.

What's Included:
  • Structured wiring throughout the home
  • Centralized equipment rack
  • In-wall touchscreens and keypads
  • Whole-home audio pre-wiring
  • Network infrastructure
  • Future expansion planning
Benefits:
  • Maximum system performance
  • Clean, professional appearance
  • Unlimited expansion potential
  • Highest reliability
Existing Homes

Retrofit Solutions

Wireless Innovation

Already built your dream home? No problem. Control4 offers retrofit-friendly wireless solutions that integrate with your current setup.

What's Included:
  • Wireless lighting control
  • Smart thermostats
  • Wireless audio systems
  • Mobile app control
  • Voice integration
  • Minimal wall modifications
Benefits:
  • Quick installation
  • Minimal disruption
  • Cost-effective upgrade
  • Expandable over time

Control Your Home Your Way

Multiple control options ensure you can manage your smart home exactly how you prefer.

Control4 OS 3 App

Manage your entire home remotely from your smartphone or tablet. Intuitive interface with customizable favorites and quick actions.

  • iOS and Android compatible
  • Remote access from anywhere
  • Customizable interface
  • Real-time system status

In-Wall Touchscreens

Sleek wall-mounted touchscreens provide elegant local control with customizable layouts and room-specific functions.

  • 7" and 10" screen options
  • Customizable layouts
  • Room-specific control
  • Intercom functionality

Universal Remotes

Premium handheld remotes with customizable buttons and intuitive layouts for effortless entertainment control.

  • Backlit buttons
  • Customizable layouts
  • RF and IR control
  • Rechargeable battery

Voice Control

Integrate with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, or Josh.ai for hands-free control of your entire smart home system.

  • Natural language commands
  • Multiple assistant support
  • Custom voice scenes
  • Privacy controls

Intelligent Automation Scenes

Pre-programmed and custom scenes make your home respond intelligently to your daily routines.

Daily Living Scenes

Good Morning

Gradually raise bedroom lights, adjust thermostat, start coffee maker, and display weather on kitchen screen.

Welcome Home

Unlock doors, turn on pathway lights, adjust climate, and start your favorite music as you arrive.

Good Night

Lock all doors, turn off lights, lower thermostat, arm security system, and close motorized shades.

Entertainment Scenes

Movie Time

Dim lights, lower screen, start projector, adjust audio levels, and close shades for the perfect viewing experience.

Party Mode

Set colorful lighting, start party playlist throughout the house, and adjust climate for increased occupancy.

Dinner Party

Create warm ambient lighting, start background music, and set comfortable temperature for entertaining.

Security & Away Scenes

Vacation Mode

Simulate occupancy with random lighting, adjust thermostat for efficiency, and enhance security monitoring.

Panic Mode

Turn on all lights, unlock specific doors, trigger security alerts, and activate emergency protocols.

Away Mode

Arm security system, adjust climate for efficiency, and activate motion-based lighting for security.

Control4 works with over 13,500 third-party products, ensuring your favorite devices work together perfectly.

Professional Installation Process

1

Design Consultation

We assess your home, understand your lifestyle, and design a custom Control4 system that meets your specific needs and budget.

2

System Programming

Our certified programmers configure your Control4 system with custom scenes, automation rules, and device integrations.

3

Professional Installation

Certified technicians install all components with attention to detail, ensuring clean wiring and optimal performance.

4

System Testing

Comprehensive testing ensures all devices communicate properly and automation scenes work as designed.

5

User Training

We provide thorough training on all system features, ensuring you're comfortable using every aspect of your smart home.

6

Ongoing Support

Lifetime support includes system updates, troubleshooting, and expansion planning as your needs evolve.
